activities.loc: Courtroom D, Fourth Floor - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Renae Ann Hoekman

records.addlTxt: Calendar call on November 28, 2022 at 10:15 am.

9:46 AM Prosecuting attorney Mary Elizabeth Bricco appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Renae Ann Hoekman appeared by video.  Attorney Robert C Howard Iii appeared by video for Renae Ann Hoekman. Officer Matt Lee sworn in and testified by video. Witness identified Defendant. State moves for bind over, Defense objects without argument. Court finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for filing of an Information. Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived. Defendants Attorney pleads not guilty and jury trial to be set.
Preliminary hearing on July 25, 2022 at 09:45 am.

01:05 PM Prosecuting attorney Noah M Tylenda and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Renae Ann Hoekman appeared by phone.  Attorney Robert C Howard Iii appeared by video for Renae Ann Hoekman. Preliminary Hearing requested by zoom, waiving time limits.Bond continued.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on July 6, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Activity:  Adjourned initial appearance  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

02:44 PM Defendant Renae Ann Hoekman in court by audio.  Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Public defender to appoint an attorney.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 6, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Activity:  Initial appearance  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

04:06 PM Defendant Renae Ann Hoekman in court in custody by video from the Rock County Jail with attorney Shanna Sanders by video. David S Olson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Address and date of birth verified. Court orders $1000 Signature Bond with conditions: No violent or disorderly contact with K.C. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 1:00 PM.
No violent or disorderly contact with K.C.
